hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.YesorNo' as lookupKey, lookup.YN_CD as value, lookup.YN_CD_LONG_TXT as label, lookup.LANGUAGE_CD as langCode, lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR as sortOrder from lkup_yn_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y' order by lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.ExchangeStatus' as lookupKey, lookup.XCHNG_STATUS_CD as value, lookup.XCHNG_STATUS_CD_LONG_TXT as label, lookup.LANGUAGE_CD as langCode, lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR as sortOrder from lkup_xchng_status_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y' order by lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.States' as lookupKey, lookup.STATE_CD as value, lookup.STATE_CD_LONG_TXT as label, lookup.LANGUAGE_CD as langCode, lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR as sortOrder from lkup_state_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y' order by lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.PlanTemplateTypes' as lookupKey, lookup.PLAN_TYP_CD as value, lookup.PLAN_TYP_LONG_TXT as label, lookup.LANGUAGE_CD as langCode, lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR as sortOrder from LKUP_PLAN_TYPE_CD lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y' order by lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.Languages' as lookupKey, lookup.LANG_CD as value, lookup.LANG_CD_LONG_TXT as label, lookup.LANGUAGE_CD as langCode, lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR as sortOrder from lkup_plan_lang_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y' order by lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.QualityRating' as lookupKey, lookup.QUALITY_CD as value, lookup.QUALITY_CD_LONG_TXT as label, lookup.LANGUAGE_CD as langCode, lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR as sortOrder from lkup_quality_rating_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y' order by lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.PlanManageType' as lookupKey, lookup.PLAN_TYPE_CD as value, lookup.PLAN_TYPE_CD_LONG_TXT as label, lookup.LANGUAGE_CD as langCode, lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR as sortOrder from lkup_plan_manage_plan_type_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y' order by lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.MetalLevel' as lookupKey, lookup.METAL_LEVEL_CD as value, lookup.METAL_LEVEL_CD_LONG_TXT as label, lookup.LANGUAGE_CD as langCode, lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR as sortOrder from lkup_metal_level_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y' order by lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.UserStatus' as lookupKey, lookup.USR_STATUS_CD as value, lookup.USR_STATUS_CD_LONG_TXT as label, lookup.LANGUAGE_CD as langCode, lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR as sortOrder from lkup_usr_status_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y' order by lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.BenefitDetail' as lookupKey, lookup.BNFT_CD as value, lookup.BNFT_ID_LONG_TXT as label, 'en_US' as langCode, '1' as sortOrder from plan_lkup_bnft_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y'

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.EhbVarRsnCd' as lookupKey, lookup.EHB_VAR_RSN_CD as value, lookup.EHB_VAR_RSN_CD_LONG_TXT as label, 'en_US' as langCode,'1' as sortOrder from plan_lkup_ehb_var_rsn_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y'

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.ChldOnlyOffering' as lookupKey, lookup.CHLD_ONLY_OFFRNG_CD as value, lookup.CHLD_ONLY_OFFRNG_ID_LONG_TXT as label, 'en_US' as langCode,'1' as sortOrder from plan_lkup_chld_only_offrng_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y'

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.Age' as lookupKey, lookup.AGE_CD as value, lookup.AGE_CD_LONG_TXT as label, 'en_US' as langCode,'1' as sortOrder from plan_lkup_age_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y'

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.RateingArea' as lookupKey, lookup.RATING_AREA_CD as value, lookup.RATING_AREA_LONG_TXT as label, 'en_US' as langCode,'1' as sortOrder from plan_lkup_rating_area_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y'

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.Tobacco' as lookupKey, lookup.TOBACCO_CD as value, lookup.TOBACCO_CD_LONG_TXT as label, 'en_US' as langCode,'1' as sortOrder from plan_lkup_tobacco_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y'

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.DtlMaxOop' as lookupKey, lookup.MAXOOP_TYPE_CD as value, lookup.MAXOOP_TYPE_LONG_TXT as label, 'en_US' as langCode,'1' as sortOrder from plan_lkup_maxoop_type_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y'

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.StatusCd' as lookupKey, lookup.WORK_ITEM_STATUS_CD as value, lookup.WORK_ITEM_STATUS_LONG_TXT as label, lookup.LANGUAGE_CD as langCode, lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR as sortOrder from lkup_work_item_status_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y' order by lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.DeductibleCd' as lookupKey, lookup.DEDUCTIBLE_TYPE_CD as value, lookup.DEDUCTIBLE_TYPE_LONG_TXT as label, 'en_US' as langCode,'1' as sortOrder from plan_lkup_deductible_type_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y'

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.BenefitDetailType' as lookupKey, lookup.BNFT_TYPE_CD as value, lookup.BNFT_TYPE_ID_LONG_TXT as label, lookup.LANGUAGE_CD as langCode, '1' as sortOrder from lkup_bnft_type_cd lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y'

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.HouseholdIncomeType' as lookupKey, lookup.INCOMETYPE_CD as value, lookup.INCOMETYPE_CD_LONG_TXT as label, lookup.LANGUAGE_CD as langCode, lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR as sortOrder from LKUP_INCOMETYPE_CD lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD = 'Y' order by lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.Counties' as lookupKey, lookup.COUNTY_CD as value, lookup.COUNTY_CD_LONG_TXT as label, lookup.LANGUAGE_CD as langCode, lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR as sortOrder from LKUP_COUNTIES_CD lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD ='Y' order by lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.Relation' as lookupKey, lookup.RELATION_CD as value, lookup.RELATION_CD_LONG_TXT as label, lookup.LANGUAGE_CD as langCode, lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR as sortOrder from LKUP_RELATION_CD lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD = 'Y' order by lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR

select 'com.hixapi.framework.lookups.ResidentType' as lookupKey, lookup.RESIDENTTYPE_CD as value, lookup.RESIDENTTYPE_CD_LONG_TXT as label, lookup.LANGUAGE_CD as langCode, lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR as sortOrder from LKUP_RESIDENTTYPE_CD lookup where lookup.ACTIVE_CD = 'Y' order by lookup.SORT_ORDER_NBR
